bluetooth_confirm.title: Confirm detected device
bluetooth_confirm.description: Do you want to add the detected Philips Shaver "{name}" to Home Assistant?

bluetooth_unpaired.title: Device not paired
bluetooth_unpaired.description:
The device "{name}" was detected, but it does not appear to be **paired** at the operating system (host OS) level.

**Important:** This integration requires pairing **before** configuration in Home Assistant (see **README, Step 1**).

Click **Submit** to continue after pairing is completed, or **Cancel** to do it later.
